document_title: Eye astigmatism: Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content:
People with astigmatism can correct the disease by wearing eyeglasses, contact lenses or surgery [4].
Wearing glasses or contact lenses corrects vision but does not change the shape of the eye. Vision correction surgery includes LASIK eye surgery, photokeratectomy or PRK eye surgery using lasers to correct vision problems. A specialist will perform procedures to change the shape of the cornea, helping light shine properly on the retina.
In addition, patients with cataracts and astigmatism are also treated at the same time during cataract surgery.
